alert.note: Alert for Tooele (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 03 at 3:49PM MDT until September 03 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BOX ELDER AND NORTH CENTRAL TOOELE COUNTIES... At 348 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 20 miles east of Montello to 11 miles northeast of Knolls, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Mesonet observed. Wind gusts in excess of 60 mph were reported earlier on I-80 with these storms. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Utah Test and Training Range North. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah near mile marker 45. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
